clinical_study.brief_title: Safety & Immunogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine 1437173A
clinical_study.official_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine 1437173A

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observer-blind study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' investigational Herpes Zoster vaccine GSK1437173A when administered as 2 doses or 3 doses to hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HCT) recipients.

detailed_description.textblock: The Protocol Posting has been updated following Protocol amendment 2, Sep 2009. The sections impacted are: eligibility criteria.

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence, intensity of solicited local and general adverse events (AEs)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Any time during the study up to Day 29 after the last vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all serious adverse events (SAEs)
Occurrence and relationship to vaccination of any new onset of autoimmune diseases and other immune mediated inflammatory disorders
Frequency of CD4 T cells specific for Varicella Zoster Virus (VZV) antigens.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of CD4 T cells specific for VZV antigens
HZ pain severity in subjects with confirmed HZ
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4-week period following the onset of the HZ rash

secondary_outcome.measure: HZ disease severity as determined by the total score of HZ-associated disease in subjects with confirmed HZ
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4-week period following the onset of the HZ rash

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of Postherpetic Neuralgia (PHN) in the entire study cohort
Incidence of other HZ-associated complications following the onset of HZ rash in subjects with confirmed HZ in the entire study cohort.

intervention.description: Different formulations of investigational vaccine (GSK 1437173A) administered in 2 or 3 doses intramuscularly.
1 or 3 doses of Placebo (saline) injected intramuscularly.
